metas.description: The full race card for the 2014 Champion Hurdle at Cheltenham including the odds and form.

page.content:
Champion Hurdle Race Card

There is no doubt that the Champion Hurdle is the biggest race on the first day of the 2014 Cheltenham Festival and as such the betting is one of the highlights of the season. It is always a fast and furious race with the fastest two mile horses in the business going head-to-head in the race. The card will have all the big runners included with their form for the season and their price to win the race at Cheltenham.

Champion Hurdle Card
